summary: THE AXLES/BRAKE ASSEMBLIES HAD DEFECTIVE INTERIOR SEALS.  THE SEALS FAILED AND CONTAMINATED THREE OUT OF FOUR BRAKES WITH GREASE.  THIS NEARLY CAUSED ME TO HAVE A SERIOUS ACCIDENT DUE TO UNABLE TO STOP THE TRAILER TO AVOID VEHICLE THAT PULLED OUT IN FRONT OF ME.  I HAD TO RUN OFF ROAD TO AVOID ACCIDENT.  THIS IS A KNOW ISSUE WITH LIPPERT COMPONENTS THAT THEY CONTINUE TO TRY TO DENY.  I ATTACHED TWO PHOTOS OF WHAT I FOUND IN THREE OUT OF FOUR BRAKE HUBS UPON INSPECTION.
